text:
No, there are no cross-saves for Bedrock Edition. A world can only be played on a platform it was created on. The only way to play this world on different platform is to connect those consoles to the same WiFi, start it on original console amd join in as a second player on other console.

EDIT: When playing through LAN, you dont have to create a new Microsoft account. You'll join as a Username (1)
